data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: As with the website blocking in Iran, the blocking software utilized by employers can be circumvented by use of proxy servers. Finding a proxy ____, a seemingly ____ task, is ____ easy. A ____ Google ____ for ____ servers ____ dozens ____ websites ____ access ____ proxy ____. As ____ as ____ blocking ____, ____ a ____ server ____ shield a user ____ some ____ software. It is important to note that companies will still be able to see that an employee visited a proxy server.

It is important to note that companies will still be able to see that an employee visited a proxy server.
data.answer: 与伊朗的网站屏蔽一样，雇主使用的屏蔽软件可以通过使用代理服务器来规避。寻找代理服务器看似是一项艰巨的任务，其实非常简单。一个快速的谷歌搜索代理服务器得到几十个允许访问代理服务器的网站_。除了环境阻止软件，使用代理服务器还可以保护用户免受某些监视软件的侵害。需要注意的是，公司仍然能够看到员工访问了代理服务器。
